Title: Esperanza Spalding releases Chamber Music Society
Description: A fusion of jazz, classical, and soul, earning critical acclaim.

Title: Robert Glasper Experiment releases Black Radio
Description: Blends jazz, R&B, and hip-hop, winning a Grammy for Best R&B Album.

Title: Cecile McLorin Salvant releases For One to Love
Description: Known for her rich vocals and storytelling in modern jazz.

Title: Kamasi Washington releases The Epic
Description: Landmark triple album pushing jazz into contemporary consciousness.

Title: Kamasi Washington releases Harmony of Difference
Description: An ambitious EP blending jazz with spiritual themes.

Title: Jazz at Lincoln Center celebrates 30 years
Description: Solidifies its role as a major jazz institution.

Title: Kamasi Washington releases Heaven and Earth
Description: Explores themes of social justice and spirituality with a grand sound.

Title: Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah releases Ancestral Recall
Description: Fuses jazz with African and indigenous sounds.

Title: Norah Jones releases Begin Again
Description: Combines jazz with indie and folk elements.

Title: Terri Lyne Carrington releases Waiting Game
Description: Explores contemporary jazz with social commentary.
